name: Boot Staggered
text: When a Cyberse monster is Normal Summoned to your field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Boot Staggered" once per turn. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Special Summon 1 "Stag Token" (Cyberse/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).
